plugins.name: FlatMagic
plugins.description:
FlatMagic is a sleek and efficient Figma plugin that transforms complex frame structures into single, flattened images with just one click. Perfect for designers who need to simplify their workflows, create thumbnails, or preserve the exact appearance of their designs.


Key Features:

• One-Click Flattening: Transform any frame or group into a single image instantly

• Smart Selection: The plugin intelligently enables only when a frame or group is selected

• Original Positioning: Maintains exact position and dimensions of your original frame

• Clean Interface: Modern, minimal UI that follows Figma's design patterns

• Resource Efficient: Reduces file size by converting complex layer structures into single images


Use Cases:

• Creating thumbnails for design systems

• Preserving complex effects and interactions

• Simplifying handoff deliverables

• Reducing file size for better performance

• Maintaining visual consistency across shared components


How to Use:

1. Select any frame or group you want to flatten

2. Run FlatMagic

3. Click 'Flatten Selection'

4. Done! Your flattened frame is ready to use


Made with ❤️ by Opeyemi Ajagbe

accepted.name: Opeyemi Ajagbe
accepted.description: I craft digital products that empower people and drive business growth.

plugins.tagline: Flatten layers instantly

117355.release_notes:
# FlatMagic v1.4.0 Release Notes

## 🚀 New Feature: Intelligent Quality Options

### Quality Selection Improvements
- Introduced dynamic quality option management for PNG exports
- Quality options now adapt based on frame dimensions
- Enhanced user experience with context-aware quality selections

### Key Changes
- For frames ≤ 1,200 x 1,200 pixels:
  - All quality options available (Default, High, Maximum)
- For frames > 1,200 x 1,200 pixels:
  - Only Default quality option available
- Default quality is now consistently set to 'Default'

### Benefits
- Prevents potential performance issues with large frames
- Provides clear, context-sensitive export options
- Maintains plugin stability across different frame sizes

## 🛠 Technical Improvements
- Refined UI initialization logic
- Improved event handling for quality option updates
- Enhanced test coverage for quality option scenarios

## Upgrade Recommendation
- Recommended for all users
- No breaking changes
- Improves overall export experience

plugins.name: Frames to WebM
plugins.description:
Easily Create Lightweight WebM Animations from Figma Frames


'Frames to WebM' offers a simple and dependable way to convert your Figma frames into WebM animations. Designed for web designers and developers, this plugin makes it easy to generate high-quality, lightweight WebM exports directly from your Figma workflow. Whether you're adding motion graphics or upgrading from GIFs, this tool provides an efficient and reliable workflow.


How it works

  1. Select Frames: Choose any number of frames in your Figma document.
  2. Open the Plugin: Access 'Frames to WebM' and set up your project.
  3. Preview and Adjust: Fine-tune the timing of your animation with a live preview.
  4. Render and Download: Your WebM is rendered in the Cloud and ready to download in moments.


Why WebM?

  1. Efficient File Sizes: WebM delivers high-quality visuals with significantly smaller file sizes compared to GIFs.
  2. Better Performance: Optimized for the web, WebM ensures faster load times and smoother playback on modern browsers.
  3. Modern Format: WebM supports higher frame rates and better compression, making it a superior choice for animations.
plugins.tagline: Easily create animated WebM videos from Figma frames

plugins.name: NavigateData
plugins.description:
🚀 Supercharge your design workflow with NavigateData Figma plugin! Seamlessly integrate Excel data into dynamic Figma components and unleash the full potential of your designs.


Steps to Use:

📂 Upload your Excel file and ensure column names match Figma component elements for precise mapping.

🔍 Review file content to confirm compatibility and compliance with plugin limitations.

⚠️ With a maximum of 15 rows per upload, optimize your data for successful processing.

🎨 Leverage advanced features to split components into frames with up to 30 rows and columns for enhanced organization.


Key Features:

🖼️ Dynamic Component Creation: Automatically generate Figma components from Excel table content.

📝 Text and Image Population: Populate Figma nodes with data from Excel files and publicly available image URLs.

➖ Split to Frames: Divide components for precise layout control and organization.


Upcoming Features:


🔍 Highlight Keywords: Improve data visibility and analysis.

📐 Responsive Font Resizing: Ensure optimal readability across devices.

💻 FigJam Code Block Generator: Facilitate collaborative coding sessions.

📊 CSV, JSON & Google Sheets Support: Expand compatibility with additional file formats.

🚀 Export Options: Share designs in SVG, PNG, JPEG, PDF formats.

📲 Publish to Social Media: Directly share Figma designs on social platforms.


Experience seamless integration, enhanced features, and unparalleled convenience in your design workflow with the Canva Bulk Create Alternative Figma plugin!

plugins.name: Float Spect - 透察
plugins.description:
透察是一款好用的设计走查工具，提供设计图和原图对比、截图、bug 管理、取色、标尺等功能， 目前提供了 Mac OS 版本。


注意：此插件需要配合透察 App 使用。


官网地址：https://fs.aihuiya.com


“Float Spect - 透察” 插件允许设计师无缝地从 Figma 将设计切图同步到 透察 App。借此，设计师可以在 Mac 的 透察 App 中轻松完成设计走查，确保开发工程师的页面实现与原始设计保持一致。

使用方法：

  • 在您的 Mac 上安装并启动 透察 App。
  • 在 Figma 中打开你想要走查的设计文件。
  • 运行“Float Spect - 透察 插件，并根据提示输入透察 App 的服务地址：http://localhost:9091
  • 选择需要同步的设计内容，并点击“上传”按钮。

主要特点：

  • 无缝同步：直接从 Figma 同步设计资料到 透察 App，免去手动导出的麻烦。
  • 质量把关：通过透察 App的审核功能，确保开发的页面与设计稿一致。
  • 数据安全：所有数据传输均在本地完成，确保设计资料的安全性。

下载透察 App：

要使用此插件，请首先在 Mac 上安装 透察 App。点击此处下载。


Description:

Float Spect for Figma allows designers to directly transfer design slices from Figma to Float Spect App. In this way, designers can effortlessly perform design inspections in the Float Spect App on their Mac, ensuring that developers' page implementations align perfectly with the original designs.

How to Use:

  • Install and launch the Float Spect App on your Mac.
  • Open the design file you wish to inspect in Figma.
  • Run the Float Spect for Figma plugin, and follow the prompts to enter the server URL for Float Spect App. The address is: http://localhost:9091
  • Select the designs you wish to transfer, and then hit the "Upload" button.

Features:

  • Seamless Integration: Transfer design slices directly from Figma to Float Spect App without the need for manual exports or other complicated processes.
  • Quality Assurance: Utilize the inspection features of Float Spect App to ensure page implementations are in perfect harmony with designs.
  • Security: All data transfers occur locally, ensuring the safety of your design data.

Download Float Spect App:

To use this plugin, you first need to install the Float Spect App on your Mac. Click here to download.
plugins.tagline: 好用的设计走查工具(A useful design review tool)

Language Weaver machine translation enables global organizations to manage multilingual content and workflows in real-time at scale. Protect your data, accelerate insight and ignite growth through Language Weaver technologies.


With the Language Weaver plugin for Figma, you can quickly and securely translate text nodes and full pages of content in Figma. These features will speed up time to market by allowing design and development teams to autonomously collaborate across languages, perform multilingual localization testing and publish translated content directly from their native working environment.


The Language Weaver plugin for Figma supports Cloud and Edge and multiple forms of authentication, giving teams access to all of their available machine translation resources at their fingertips.

  1. 内容填充 - 快速为你的设计稿批量填充带有格式的文本或者图片，同时我们引用了 AI 生成，快速帮你批量生成想要的文本

  3. Semi 主题同步 - 快速同步你的自定义 Semi 主题到 UI Kit


如何使用

  1. 安装 plugin ，选择对应的功能分类
  2. 主题同步、切换账号以及语言切换，在导航栏的更多选项中


支持

  1. Design System Manage
  2. Semi Data Visualization


Developed by the Semi team, it is a functional plugin designed to boost the efficiency of designers.


Features

  1. Content Filling: Quickly batch - fill your design drafts with formatted text or images. Also, we've integrated AI generation to rapidly generate the desired text for you in batches.
  2. Data Visualization Generation: We've connected to the Semi DV style library, enabling you to directly generate corresponding charts in the Figma terminal and output code simultaneously. Currently, it supports 12 types with a total of 30 cases.
  3. Semi Theme Synchronization: Swiftly synchronize your custom Semi theme to the UI Kit.


How to Use

  1. Install the plugin and select the corresponding functional category.
  2. For theme synchronization, account switching, and language switching, find them in the "More" options of the navigation bar.


Support

  1. Design System Manage
  2. Semi Data Visualization

plugins.name: Quicksubs
plugins.description:
✨ Welcome to Quicksubs! ✨


Quicksubs is a simple plugin that does one thing well: generate batches of PNG images from a template, replacing text content from a CSV.


Using Quicksubs is easy:

  1. Create your template, renaming your text nodes correctly
  2. Select the template frame and open Quicksubs
  3. Drag in your CSV
  4. Profit


See this link for full documentation and a How To guide.


--


Why Quicksubs: It was originally built for a YouTube channel that regularly needed 200+ subtitle overlays for their multi-lingual videos. Each subtitle frame instance contained 2 languages, each with separate fonts, and different text treatment. Figma seemed the perfect software to create the template, they just needed an efficient way to replace the text and export it hundreds of times.

plugins.name: Don't Need
plugins.description:
"Delete for now!"

"Next time!"

"Pend!"

Have you ever been in a sad situation like this?

This is the perfect plug-in for you.


How to

Simply select the FRAMES or COMPONENTS you no longer need and choose between 'Deleted', 'Pending', and 'Moved'.

(If you would like to use different wording, simply select "Customize".)


-------------------


せっかく頑張って作ったのに

「この画面・機能一旦なしで」

「一旦ペンディングで」

という台無しな一言…


Don't Needはこんな場面にピッタリのプラグインです。


使い方

一旦必要なくなったFRAMEやCOMPONENTを選択して「Deleted」「Pending」「Moved」から選ぶだけです。

（もし、他の文言を使いたい方は「Customize」を選択して文言を入れるだけです。）

plugins.name: Rad Dude
plugins.description:
Sometimes you just want to quickly change radius on multiple selection, wouldn’t be that rad? 😎


Now you can! Select any layer(s) that contain radius, and change it to your liking (including children layers).

  4. Type in your desired radius value or select from the list, hit enter
  5. That’s rad, dude! 🏄‍♂️


Credits

Massive thanks to Gustavo and lukebrobbs for making it happen!

plugins.name: Figma Time Tracker
plugins.description:
Have you ever lost track of time while working in Figma? Our time-tracking plugin is designed to solve this problem.


This plugin allows you to automatically track the time you spend actively working in Figma by recording your interactions based on actions such as cursor movement and document changes. It’s an ideal solution for designers and teams who need to accurately track their time without manual interruptions.


Key Features:


Automatic activity tracking:

  1. The plugin starts tracking time automatically while you interact with the project.
  2. It records actions such as element selection and document changes.


Automatic pause on inactivity:

  1. If there is no activity for 30 seconds, the timer pauses automatically.
  2. It resumes as soon as it detects movement or actions in the file.


Minimalist and floating interface:

  1. Compact size to avoid interfering with your workspace.
  2. Can be freely moved across the screen for convenience.


Tracking control:

  1. A single button to manually pause and resume tracking when needed.


Time tracking in seconds and minutes:

  1. Clear and precise display of elapsed time on the interface.


This plugin is designed to help designers focus on what really matters—creativity—while time tracking is handled automatically and effortlessly.


Optimize your workflow and manage your time more effectively with our Figma tracking plugin!
plugins.tagline: Optimize your work time in Figma with automatic activity tracking.

CopyGlyphs delivers the easiest way to work with special characters in Figma. Explore the world of glyphs, ligatures, emojis, and other symbols directly in Figma using the CopyGlyphs plugin.


Key features

  1. 100+ glyphs
  2. Search functionality
  3. Fully keyboard controllable
  4. Available in Figma
  5. Dark mode support


How to use

  1. Click to copy any glyph and paste it wherever you want in Figma.

plugins.name: Color Mate by UX mate
plugins.description:
Color Mate by UX Mate: Your Color Assistant in Figma


Struggling to create harmonious color palettes? Color Mate is here to be your color confidante in Figma! This user-friendly plugin takes the guesswork out of color selection, allowing you to generate beautiful and cohesive palettes based on a single chosen color.


Here's how Color Mate streamlines your design workflow:


Pick Your Perfect Base: Select any color that sparks your design inspiration – it can be from your existing design or a new hue you've discovered.

Explore a Spectrum of Styles: Choose from various color scheme types like Monochromatic, Contrast, Triadic, and more, each offering a unique color harmony.

Fine-Tune Your Palette: Customize the palette by selecting variations like Pastel, Soft, Light, Hard, Pale, and others – find the perfect balance for your design needs.

Generate Endless Possibilities: Need more palette options? No problem! Color Mate allows you to generate as many palettes as you desire until you find the perfect fit.

Seamless Integration: Once you're happy with your chosen palette, effortlessly create Figma Color Styles directly from the generated colors. This ensures consistent use of your chosen color scheme throughout your design.


With Color Mate, you can:


Save valuable design time: Stop wasting precious minutes mixing and matching colors – Color Mate generates ready-to-use palettes in seconds.

Experiment with confidence: Explore diverse color harmonies without worrying about clashing colors.

Achieve design consistency: Create cohesive color schemes with ease thanks to Figma Style generation.

Color Mate by UX Mate – Your key to effortless and beautiful color palettes in Figma!
plugins.tagline: Your Color Assistant in Figma

plugins.name: Hide/Delete All Grid Layouts
plugins.description:
On the current Figma version, when you select multiple frames, with different layout grids applied, you don't have options to hide, show or delete their layout grids.


This plugin lets you hide, show, or delete layout grids on the selected frames (or components). You can apply to all frames on the current page.


Features

  1. Hide, show or delete layout grids on all frames and components (also nested frames) on the current page
  2. Select multiple frames to hide, show or delete them.


Quick Actions

  1. Open
  2. Hide Grids
  3. Show Grids
  4. Hide Selected Grids
  5. Show Selected Grids


Pricing

  1. Hiding, Showing and Deleting layout grids on the current page are FREE.
  2. A one-time purchase to hide, show and delete the selected frames.

accepted.description: I make premium Figma Plugins

plugins.name: Export local variables to Json
plugins.description:
Plugin Overview

This plugin takes Local Variables of Figma and outputs them as a JSON file in Style Dictionary format. This allows design tokens to be efficiently reflected in the code.


Main Functions

1. Get Local Variables

- Color values

- Spacing

- Typography

and other variables are automatically retrieved


2. Maintain hierarchical structure

// Maintain Figma structure (e.g.colors/primary/base) in JSON format
{
"colors": {
"primary": {
"base": {
"$value": "#1a2b3c",
"$type": "color"
}
}
}
}


3. Value Conversion

- Colors: Convert from RGBA to HEX format

- Numbers: Manage decimal precision

- Variable references: Properly resolve aliases


How to Use

1. Launch the plugin in Figma

2. Click the "Export" button

3. Download the generated JSON file


Features

- JSON output compliant with Style Dictionary format

- Simple UI

- Error fallback handling

- Comprehensive validation


Applications

- Design system construction

- Batch management of design tokens

- Synchronization with codebase


This plugin enables seamless bridging between design and code.
plugins.tagline: you can export all local variables as json

plugins.name: Text Case Converter
plugins.description:
Time to jazz up your designs! Select your artboards or text layers, launch the plugin, and voila! Instantly convert them to sentence case or title case.


Got words that need a special treatment? Pop 'em into the Preserved Terms list and watch the magic happen!


Plugin ignores words in FULL CAPS to avoid messing up acronyms.


Note: When multiple colors or text styles are present within a text layer, the plugin will apply the color/style of the first character to the entire text layer.

plugins.description:
Simplify your app localization workflow right from Figma.


SimpleLocalize for Figma helps you preview your designs in multiple languages with just a few clicks. Connect your project to pull translations directly from SimpleLocalize and see how your UI looks in different languages, right inside Figma.


Quick start:

  1. Create SimpleLocalize project, add languages
  2. Open up SimpleLocalize plugin in Figma
  3. Select text elements
  4. Hit "Push translations"
  5. Auto-translate texts
  6. Change the language in Figma plugin and hit "Pull translations"
  7. Done!


Automatically generate translation keys with screenshots, and upload new or updated text back to your SimpleLocalize project. No more manual work or version confusion.

Whether you're building global products or collaborating with localization teams, SimpleLocalize makes it easy to manage translations during the design stage.


If you have any issues or suggestions, hit us up on figma@simplelocalize.io or create an issue here: https://simplelocalize.io/feature-requests
plugins.tagline: Localization made simple for global design

plugins.name: Variables Editor
plugins.description:
Take control of your variables with the updated Variables Editor plugin. Designed to simplify variable management in Figma, this version lets you edit linked variables directly, avoid complex navigation, and keep your workflow smooth and intuitive.


Key Features:

  1. Edit variables in place: Select any text linked to a variable and start editing it right there — no need to dig through nested structures or remember paths.
  2. Reference-aware updates: Seamlessly edit variables that reference others. Your changes automatically apply to the final target without breaking the original links.
  3. Multi-line inputs with line breaks: Edit values in spacious fields with full support for line breaks, giving you more flexibility than native controls.
  4. Undo changes instantly: Easily revert variable names or values to their previous state with a single click.
  5. Quick variable creation: Add new variables directly to the current collection, right next to the selected variable, without leaving the editing context.
  6. Resizable interface: Adjust the plugin window and input fields to suit your needs, whether working with simple text or complex structures.


Perfect for localization, UI text management, and advanced variable workflows, the Variables Editor plugin is here to help you focus on design, not tedious variable navigation.


How to assign a shortcut to the “Variables Editor” plugin:

  1. Go to System Preferences > Keyboard > Shortcuts.
  2. Select App Shortcuts from the left-hand menu.
  3. Click the + button to create a new shortcut.
  4. Set Application to Figma.
  5. Enter Variables Editor (exact plugin name) in the Menu Title field.
  6. Assign your desired shortcut (e.g., ⌘ + `)
  7. Click Add to confirm.


Your plugin is now accessible using ⌘ + `!
plugins.tagline: Find and edit variables directly in place, without navigating nested structures or losing focus.

plugins.name: Batch Copy Link
plugins.description:
You don't believe it, but this plugin allows you to copy links to Figma objects.


You can copy them as a plain text, Markdown or Jira markup.


Moreover, you can create a Figma frame with all the links. It's useful if you need to create TOC for your page, or a changelog.


To use the plugin simply select Figma objects (e.g. frames), and invoke the plugin.
plugins.tagline: Copy links to frames in different formats, or generate a Figma node with them

plugins.name: ark-tailwind-codegen
plugins.description:
This plugin is based on Parbez's figma-tailwindcss plugin


It uses ARK's custom Tailwind theme to convert Figma's CSS output into tailwind classes that can be used in conjunction with our design system.


The source code is available on Github


How to use

  1. Click the Open in... button and choose the file you want to use it in
  2. Go to your file and make sure you’re in Dev Mode (if there are green buttons in the UI, you’re in the right place 👌)
  3. Select the layers you want to generate the class names for
  4. Make sure you have the Inspect panel open on the right-hand side
  5. Scroll down to the 'tailwindcss' section et voilà ✨


  1. If you don’t see this section but instead see an Inspect layer properties button, click it and you should see that section appear
  2. If you still can’t see the section, make sure you’ve got `ark-tailwind-code` plugin selected from dropdown at the top-right of the `Code` section


Todo

  1. [ ] Import tailwind theme from @ark/theming
  2. [ ] Custom typography classes
  3. [ ] Convert layout variables to classes
  4. [ ] Prettier?
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma's css output into tailwind classes that match our custom theme.

plugins.name: Frame Organizer
plugins.description:
This plugin is ideal for cleaning up frames that are slightly misaligned when creating documents.


It adjusts the spacing between frames horizontally and vertically while maintaining the overall layout. You can set the horizontal and vertical margins and the amount of misalignment to ignore.


資料作成などで、並んでいるフレームがすこしだけがたがたしているのを綺麗にするのに最適なプラグインです。


全体の大まかなレイアウトは維持したまま、横方向、縦方向のフレーム間の間隔を調整します。横方向、縦方向のマージンや、無視するズレの大きさを設定可能です。
plugins.tagline: Clean Frame Alignment

plugins.name: Vector to Rectangle
plugins.description:
The Problem

When importing Illustrator files into Figma, rectangles often get converted to vector shapes, losing their adjustable properties like corner radius. This can be a huge headache, especially when dealing with numerous elements.


The Solution

This plugin automatically converts these vectorized rectangles back into native Figma rectangles, preserving their adjustable properties.


Key Features

  1. Automatically detects vectorized rectangles from Illustrator imports
  2. Converts vectors to native Figma rectangles with editable properties
  3. Preserves corner radii and other rectangle attributes
  4. Batch processing for multiple elements at once
  5. Significant time-saver for designers.
plugins.tagline: Converts messed up vectors to rectangles.

plugins.name: MotionPoint Translator
plugins.description:
Overview

Unlock the full potential of your Figma designs with our state-of-the-art plugin. Designed for seamless integration, this tool brings professional translation services into your Figma workflow, automating the creation of translated versions of your designs.


Seamless Integration

Bridge the gap between design and global communication by automating the generation of translated Figma designs. Our plugin ensures your UI/UX resonates with audiences worldwide, offering both human and machine translation options.


Simple Steps to Localization

Language Selection: Start by choosing the languages you want to translate your design into, ensuring a wide-reaching impact.

Translation Quality: Select the desired level of translation quality—opt for Human Translation for nuanced accuracy or Machine Translation for swift turnaround.

Translation Progress: Monitor the translation's progress with ease. Our plugin keeps you updated every step of the way.

Import Translations: Once translations are complete, import them directly from the Progress tab or use the Import tab to generate the translated designs for all selected languages


Effortless Process

With minimal effort, watch as your Figma projects elevate to an international standard. Our plugin simplifies the complexities of localization, letting you focus on what you do best: creating stunning, culturally resonant designs.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly bridge Figma to professional translation, automating your content localization.

plugins.name: Text Translator By ChatGPT
plugins.description:
Text Translator 📝 allows you to effortlessly translate your text layers into multiple languages without leaving Figma. Supporting over 130 languages and integrated with the ChatGPT large language model, it provides fast and accurate translations. Preview your designs in different languages, catch localization layout issues early, and adapt your projects for new markets—all within your Figma workspace.


Key Features:

  1. 📝 Mixed Text Style Compatibility — Text Translator preserves the integrity of mixed text styles, ensuring that translated content retains the intended formatting and layout.
  2. 📝 Design-Wide Translation — Easily translate individual text layers or entire sections, groups, or frames for seamless multilingual conversion.
  3. 📝 Table Translation — Instantly translate the text within tables in your designs.
  4. 📝 Support for over 130 languages, enhanced by the ChatGPT large language model for smarter and more accurate translations.
  5. 📝 Integrated with Figma's Quick Actions, allowing you to quickly translate designs without navigating the plugin interface.
  6. 📝 Intelligent selection detection lets you translate entire layers, groups of layers, or specific text within a layer with a single button press.
  7. 📝 Keyboard input mode for translating non-design text such as text variables or quick communication with international teammates.


More

https://aluminum-skate-8b5.notion.site/Text-Translator-Figma-Plugin-12a4265e9ea280adaa79e6045069b709
plugins.tagline: Translate effortlessly with ChatGPT – your text layers, now multilingual
